attributes.action: Prioritise unpaid carers to be vaccinated at the same time as paid carers.
attributes.background: Unpaid carers have been shielding their loved ones and patients since March, sacrificing their own wellbeing and being unable to see their own families and friends.  They must be vaccinated against Covid-19 as a matter of urgency and considered as much of a priority as care home workers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552473
